wikipedia.title: Trans Europ Express (disambiguation)
wikipedia.extract:
Trans Europ Express is a former international train network in Europe.
It may also refer to:

Trans-Europ-Express (film), a 1966 film written and directed by Alain Robbe-Grillet
Trans-Europe Express (album), The Kraftwerk album
"Trans-Europe Express" (song), The Kraftwerk single
